articles.author: New York Times
articles.title: Bread prices skyrocket as inflation grips Europe - Economic Times
articles.description: As inflation continues to flare, few matters are causing more concern than the cost of a basic loaf. Prices for the most essential food staple have never been higher, and are now up nearly 19% from a year ago, the fastest rise on record.
articles.content: VERDELOT, France: Since Russias invasion of Ukraine, the price of the wheat that Julien Bourgeois grinds for boulangeries at his familys flour mill in central France has increased more than 30%. The … [+8046 chars]

articles.author: ET Now Digital
articles.title: Companies that ended work from home saw spike in resignations: Survey - Times Now
articles.description: In August, resignations at companies, which asked employees to imminently return to offices, increased to 29% as compared to 19% at those which did not. Most companies have allowed employees to work in a hybrid setting based on job role requirements.
